body: Just baked my first #sourdough loaf! Took a few tries, but it finally came out right. Thoughts? #baking #homemadebread

comments.body: That looks perfect! How’s the crust? I’ve heard that’s the hardest part to get right.
@65656 Thanks! The crust is super crispy. I followed a tip to use steam in the oven, and it made a big difference.
That’s some pro-level baking! Did you use a starter you made yourself?
@76767 Yep, made the starter from scratch! Took about a week to get it going, but totally worth it.
@54545 That’s impressive! I’ve been meaning to try making my own starter, but it seems tricky.
That loaf looks bakery-quality! What flour did you use? I’ve been experimenting with different kinds for my bread.
@87878 Thanks! I used a mix of bread flour and whole wheat. The whole wheat gives it a really nice flavor.
Please tell me you’re enjoying that with some fresh butter. Nothing beats that combo!
@98989 Oh absolutely! Fresh bread and butter is heaven. I might even try making my own butter next!
You’re making me want to bake now! How long did the whole process take?
@10101 Do it! The whole process took about 24 hours between feeding the starter, letting the dough rise, and baking. But so worth it!
